input_text:
Job Title: Market Development Manager

Location: Waltham, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Marketing, Public Relations

Description:
Market Development Manager R-01242764 

A Day in the life

We are looking for a result driven and innovative Global Market Development Manager to help build and implement marketing strategies and programs for a robust portfolio of single-use consumable solutions supporting a variety of modalities. This is an exciting and evolving market that requires dynamic and adaptable marketing efforts.

The candidate in this role will need to successfully work within a highly matrixed organization to develop global, multi-channel marketing campaigns, and build and manage tactical execution to achieve marketing and revenue targets. This individual should have a strong background in B2B marketing, with demonstrated ability to optimize marketing efforts by channel and funnel stage.

Key Responsibilities

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement global, multi-channel marketing campaigns for single-use bioprocessing technologies.Lead the creation and execution of engaging content to generate awareness and drive demand; measure and understand the customer experience through the buyers' journey with emphasis on digital channels.Collaborate and ensure alignment of marketing plans among Product Management, Regional Market Development, R&D, Commercial Leaders, and other collaborators.Conduct market research and analysis to identify customer needs, market trends, and competitive landscape, and use this information to define marketing strategies.Work closely with product management to ensure product positioning, messaging, and value propositions are aligned with customer needs.Partner with digital marketing colleagues to implement and optimize performance across digital channels.Ensure ongoing collaboration and alignment with regional counterparts as well as other cell therapy businesses and initiatives within the company.Track and analyze marketing campaign performance, provide insights, and recommend improvements to enhance marketing effectiveness and return on investment.Stay abreast of bioprocessing industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitive landscape.May perform other related duties as required and/or assigned.

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in marketing, business administration, life sciences, or a related field.At least 5+ years of marketing experience in developing marketing campaigns for the biopharma/biotech market segmentDemonstrated experience in marketing strategy development and execution.Ability to work effectively in a matrixed organization.Results-oriented mindset, with a track record of achieving or exceeding targets.Ability to adapt to a fast-paced and evolving market.Strong organizational skills and ability to run multiple projects simultaneously.Exceptional verbal/written communication skills.B2B and life science/biopharma experience required.Ability to travel up to 10% of the time

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Market Development Manager
output_json.summary: A result-driven and innovative Global Market Development Manager is sought to build and implement marketing strategies and programs for single-use consumable solutions.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor's degree in marketing, business administration, life sciences, or a related field
soft_skills: Ability to run multiple projects simultaneously
job_responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement global, multi-channel marketing campaigns.
Lead the creation and execution of engaging content to generate awareness and drive demand.
Collaborate and ensure alignment of marketing plans among Product Management, Regional Market Development, R&D, Commercial Leaders, and other collaborators.
Conduct market research and analysis to identify customer needs, market trends, and competitive landscape.
Work closely with product management to ensure product positioning, messaging, and value propositions are aligned with customer needs.
Partner with digital marketing colleagues to implement and optimize performance across digital channels.
Ensure ongoing collaboration and alignment with regional counterparts as well as other cell therapy businesses and initiatives within the company.
Track and analyze marketing campaign performance, provide insights, and recommend improvements to enhance marketing effectiveness and return on investment.
Stay abreast of bioprocessing industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitive landscape.

other.content: Bachelor's degree in marketing, business administration, life sciences, or a related field. At least 5+ years of marketing experience in developing marketing campaigns for the biopharma/biotech market segment. Demonstrated experience in marketing strategy development and execution. Ability to work effectively in a matrixed organization. Results-oriented mindset, with a track record of achieving or exceeding targets. Ability to adapt to a fast-paced and evolving market. Strong organizational skills and ability to run multiple projects simultaneously. Exceptional verbal/written communication skills. B2B and life science/biopharma experience required. Ability to travel up to 10% of the time.
